sentences.sContent: On New Year's Eve we had a barbecue on the beach.
sentences.sCn: 除夕那天我们在海滩上举行了烧烤野餐。

phrases.pCn: 烤肉调味酱；在全烧时涂抹烤物用的沙司；烧烤鱼或肉时所用调味液

remMethod.val: barb(倒钩)+ecue→用倒钩挂上烤肉→在烤架上烧烤

trans.tranOther: a meal or party during which food is cooked on a metal frame over a fire and eaten outdoors
to cook food on a metal frame over a fire outdoors
